name: Ankora: Lost Days
description:
Discover the wild planet Ankora and explore freely around this mysterious world full of promise and danger. Craft different tools, build structures and terraform yourself a new home in this cute-as-heck survival game.

M청n is a Junior Ranger from the Interstellar Patrol, stranded on the unexplored planet Ankora after her spaceship crashes there. M청n will need to craft her own tools to collect the necessary resources for her adventure, overcoming many obstacles: rivers, lakes, waterfalls, mountains... and monsters.

Ankora is a huge place. Explore freely around this mysterious planet full of promises and danger. Create different tools, build structures and terraform yourself a new home in the wild.

Use the hammer to build structures, the shovel to dig and modify the terrain and the bow to defend yourself!

- Level up with each action. Learn new recipes and skills in order to improve your chances of surviving. 
- Visuals inspired by Studio Ghibli films like Nausica채 of the Valley of the Wind. A modern setting in a fantasy universe.

intro: Discover the wild planet of Ankora in a single-player survival adventure with exploration and crafting. A tale about growing up, making friends and connecting with nature.
